answers.answer: I had a succesful induced VBAC almost 7 years ago. I am 36wks and my dr wont Induce me either.  They said between then and now they have found more women with ruptured uterus' when they are induced via VBAC.  Plus they are scared of law suits, etc....it kinda sucks because I have GD and am high risk so now I am scheduled for a c-sect.....

question: I had a c section 5 years ago and am now 22w pg... dr said she will only vbac if I go naturally no inducing.  I have always been induced due to gestational diabetes.... any ideas?
title: Vbac... any complications
